altername_name: Boku no Hero Academia: Battle for All
name: My Hero Academia: Battle for All
overview: My Hero Academia: Battle for All is a hero action game for the Nintendo 3DS developed by Dimps. It was released on May 19th, 2016. With 14 playable characters and a variety of sidekicks, you can progress through the “Hero Academia Mode”, take part in various missions, and challenge your friends with all your favourite heroes.
